itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Monday, December 23, 2013
title: A startup that gives back
teaser: A new company started by University of North Carolina students is partnering with Amazon to help give back this holiday season.
contentencoded: There's a new charitable giving startup built by students at the University of North Carolina. It launched during finals week, and it's designed to help us give a little something extra to families in need while we do our own last minute holiday shopping. The company is called CommuniGift, and it's partnered with online retailer Amazon.  Taylor Sharp, co-founder of CommuniGift, tells Marketplace Tech about how the company works.
